trans-unit.source: Defines the delegate for the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"></xref> class.
The RoleManagerEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.

You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application as shown in the example for this topic.
You can use the RoleManagerEventHandler to replace the creation of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> with your own custom object.
To do this, define a delegate using the RoleManagerEventHandler and assign it to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
